mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wallet (user_id, total_income, balance, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalIncome}, #{balance}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

UPDATE wallet SET balance = balance - #{amount}, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND balance >= #{amount}
